Uses of Class
Editor.Field

  • Packages that use Field 
    Package Description
    Editor  

    • Uses of Field in Editor

      Subclasses of Field in Editor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Earth
      The Earth class is a child of the Field class and is simply the type of field which is solid, but transforms into Floor when it is destroyed It is also capable of spawning Powerups when destroyed
      class  Exit
      The Exit class is a child of the Field class and is very similar to the Floor class, except for the overwritten enter() method Should a Character enter the Exit, the next Level ist started.
      class  Floor
      The Floor class is a child of the Field class and is the typical passable Field which does not hinder Characters or flames.
      class  Stone
      The Stone class is a child of the Field class and is simply the type of field which is solid, and does not change even when bombs explode in its vicinity
      Methods in Editor that return Field 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Field Field.copy() 
      Field Level.getField(int x, int y) 
      Field Field.isTransformable() 
      Methods in Editor with parameters of type Field 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Constructor and Description
      Field(boolean solid, Field transformto, java.awt.Image image, boolean spawnsPowerup, boolean exit, java.lang.String fieldtype) 
      Field(Field field)
